value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with itsâ€™ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase

value.title: Implement a secure environment for a database service
value.excerpt: Implement SQL Server-based options for authentication and authorization, as well as Azure options for securing Azure SQL databases. Explore encryption, firewalls and advanced threat protection.

topItems.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
topItems.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

topItems.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
topItems.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

topItems.title: Implement compliance controls for sensitive data
topItems.excerpt: Explore data classification capabilities and degrees of confidentiality. Explore and configure advanced threat protection options, including SQL Injection.

value.title: Implement knowledge mining with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Do you have information locked up in structured and unstructured data sources?  Using Azure Cognitive Search, you can extract key insights from this data, and enable applications to search and analyze them.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cognitive Search solution
topItems.excerpt: Unlock the hidden insights in your data with Azure Cognitive Search.

topItems.title: Create an enrichment pipeline with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Use the power of artificial intelligence to enrich your data and find new insights.

topItems.title: Create a knowledge store with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to persist the output from an Azure Cognitive Search enrichment pipeline for independent analysis or downstream processing.

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM Identity
value.excerpt: After completing this learning path, youâ€™ll know how to implement identity in Azure. Youâ€™ll be able to extend an existing on-premises Active Directory identity service into Azure.

topItems.excerpt: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS active directory domain controllers in Azure

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM networking
value.excerpt: In this learning path, youâ€™ll learn about Azure IaaS networking and identity. After completing the learning path, youâ€™ll be able to implement IP addressing, manage DNS, and deploy and manage domain controllers in Azure.

value.excerpt: Learn how to work with Azure Arc enabled servers and describe Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Arc
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Arc

topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to Azure Arc enabled servers and describes its characteristics, capabilities, and use cases.

value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Migrating Cassandra and MongoDB workloads to Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: The focus of this learning path is to migrate MongoDB and Cassandra databases to Azure Cosmos DB.

topItems.title: Introduction to open source database migration to Azure Cosmos DB
topItems.excerpt: An introduction to migrating an open-source database to Azure Cosmos DB

value.title: Plan and implement a high availability and disaster recovery environment
value.excerpt: Data must be available when needed. Configure, test and manage a solution for high availability and disaster recovery using Azure tools and SQL Server tools.

topItems.title: Describe high availability and disaster recovery strategies
topItems.excerpt: Plan appropriate HA/DR strategy based on RTO and RPO. Choose best solution for IaaS or PaaS deployments or hybrid workloads.

topItems.title: Explore IaaS and PaaS platform tools for high availability and disaster recovery
topItems.excerpt: Deploy Windows Server Failover Cluster and AGs in Azure and hybrid environments. Configure temporal tables, geo-replication and auto failover groups.

topItems.title: Back up and restore databases
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement policy for recovering data in case of user error or failure of technology. Explore various options for how and where to backup and restore databases.

value.title: Provision and manage Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn about Cognitive Services and the important role they play in developing AI infused applications.  This learning path will introduce you to creating, managing, and deploying Cognitive Services in the Azure portal or through containers.

topItems.title: Create and manage Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Azure Cognitive Services enable developers to easily add cognitive features into their applications. Learn how to configure and manage these services for your AI application needs.

topItems.title: Investigate container for use with Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Container support in Cognitive Services allowing the use of APIs available in Azure and enable flexibility in where to deploy and host the services with Docker containers.

topItems.title: Secure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to secure Cognitive Services to prevent data loss and privacy violations for user data that may be a part of the solution.

value.title: Scale AI in your organization
value.excerpt: Learn to manage AI organization to create business value in manufacturing, healthcare, financial services, retail, education, and Government.

value.title: Accelerate your migration journey to Azure
value.excerpt: There are many reasons for moving to Azure and a proven, methodical approach can help you navigate that journey successfully. Microsoft provides a guidance, tools and programs you can use to ensure success.

value.title: Accelerate and scale a Spring Boot application with Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn what Azure Cache for Redis is, and how to use it with a Java and Spring Boot application. You'll use it to cache some business data using Spring Data Redis, and also to store HTTP session data using Spring Session.

value.title: Access Metrics from your Azure Blob Storage Containers Programmatically
value.excerpt: Discover how to use Azure Monitor to gather performance metrics and then configure and access those metrics from .NET application code.

value.excerpt: Learn how to set up the built-in Django admin site and configure users for the site.
